name: Overclocked (itch) (Stuart Heath, ZGS17, AleksandraZ)
description:
Overclocked- Coventry University 2023 - End of year Jam - Team Sonic

Produced for end of year game jam

Team consisting of:

  • Stuart Heath (Programming)
  • Aleksandra Zatorska (3d Art + Level Building)
  • Peter Newman (3d Character modelling and animation)
  • Sam White (Menu Systems)

Controls:

  • Left Player:
    • WASD + Space to interact
  • Right Player:
    • Arrows + Enter to interact
